doc:
Esmond Knight https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esmond_Knight 0 Esmond Penington Knight (4 May 1906 – 23 February 1987) was an English actor. He had a successful stage and film career before World War II. For much of his later career Knight was half blind. He had been badly injured in 1941 whilst on active service on board HMS Prince of Wales when she fought the Bismarck at the Battle of the Denmark Strait, and remained totally blind for two years, though he later regained some sight in his right eye. Esmond_Penington_Knight ( 4_May_1906 – 23_February_1987 ) was an_English_actor . He had a_successful_stage_and_film_career before World_War_II . For much of his_later_career_Knight was half_blind . He had_been_badly_injured in 1941 whilst on active_service on board_HMS_Prince of Wales when she fought the_Bismarck at the_Battle of the_Denmark_Strait , and remained totally_blind for two_years , though he later regained some_sight in his_right_eye .
